member.name: T:Deveel.Data.QueryStringResultSort
member.summary: Provides utility methods to parse and format a strings of sorting rules for query strings of HTTP requests.

member.name: M:Deveel.Data.QueryStringResultSort.TryParse(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Deveel.Data.IResultSort}@)
member.summary: Attempts to parse the given string as a list of sorting rules
member.param: The list of sorting rules parsed from the string.
member.returns: Returns true if the string was successfully parsed, and the contains the list of sorting rules, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Deveel.Data.QueryStringResultSort.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the given string as a list of sorting rules
member.returns: Returns a list of sorting rules parsed from the given string.
member.exception: Thrown if the given string is not a valid list of sorting rules
